reviewText:
Penthouse Pets 30:60 A Collection is one hour long. The video contains thirty Penthouse Pets is a sixty minute video. That is about two minutes per Pet. Unfortunately that is not true not all Pets got equal air time. I good example is Mahalia Maria Penthouse Pet January 1991 who get less then thirty seconds. Only five of the ladies decided to keep their clothes one. The rest of them posed in the nude. Some right away and some not. The only real bone I have to pick with the video is, once you started to enjoy one of the ladies then another would show up. It would have been much better if they did fifteen ladies in sixty minutes or made this a ninety minute video. Penthouse Pets 30:60 A Collection gets an AAAA++++.
